text: Jorge Ramón Akapo Mambo (born 21 November 1992) is an Equatorial Guinean footballer who plays as a defender for Futuro Kings FC and the Equatorial Guinea national team. ==International career== Akapo made his international debut for Equatorial Guinea in 2018. ==Personal life== Akapo is a cousin of fellow Equatorial Guinean international footballer Carlos Akapo. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Equatoguinean footballers Category:People from Malabo Category:Equatorial Guinea international footballers Category:Equatoguinean men's futsal players
title: Jorge Akapo
